content.p: You’ve successfully secured a job, well done! Whether you're undertaking an internship or placement, or starting a graduate role, this section will help you to thrive at work. From avoiding a first day false start to settling in and finding your groove. You’ll find expert advice alongside real life insight and pearls of wisdom from University of Nottingham alumni. Advice on preparing for day one and the actual day In this section: Before you start Day one checklist Making a good impression Advice on settling in and making an impact Workplace communication Maintaining your well-being Working digitally Quick wins for early success Reflecting on your first few weeks Authenticity at work Advice on developing your skills and career In this section, top tips split into three sections: People at work Everyday tasks Professional development telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
